rows.label: tlk43100143_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Everyone who managed to get out of the
way of the Superbian army is okay. But
my dad hasn't come back yet...

rows.label: tlk43100143_04_msg0002
rows.name:
We haven't heard from him.
So we don't know if he's okay,
or if he's been hurt...

rows.label: tlk43100143_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll never forget what
the Superbians did.

rows.label: tlk43100143_04_msg0004
rows.name:
When I'm a Driver, I'm gonna fight for
justice with a Light-type Blade! And I'll
teach those Superbians a thing or two!

rows.label: tlk43100143_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Huh? Light-type Blades are
hard to find, you say?

rows.label: tlk43100143_04_msg0006
rows.name:
But if I just set my mind to it,
I'm sure I'll be able to resonate
with a really awesome one.
